name: Cranberry Infused Grand Marnier
ingredients: 2 bags cranberries, roasted at 350°F for 10 minutes
method: Torch cranberries after roasting. Combine with Cointreau in a cambro. Let infuse for 72 hours. Strain.

name: Vanilla Bean Infused Jameson
method: Combine in cambro. Let infuse for 72 hours. Strain.

name: Cinnamon Maple Syrup
method: Boil water, add maple syrup and cinnamon. Simmer to infuse.

name: Chai Dem
method: Simmer ingredients together for 10 minutes. Strain.

name: Rosemary Infused Ketel One
method: Combine in cambro. Let infuse for 72 hours. Strain.

name: Orange Agave
method: Boil water and agave. Add orange peels and simmer for 10 minutes.

name: Lapsang Syrup
method: Steep tea for 5 minutes. Add sugar and stir to dissolve.

name: Spiced Pear Syrup
ingredients: Equal parts water and demerara sugar
method: Boil and then simmer all ingredients for 30 minutes. Strain.

name: Honey Ginger Syrup
ingredients: 1 cup fresh ginger per quart of water
method: Boil water, add honey and ginger. Steep 10-15 minutes. Strain.
